title: Happy Birthday Keith!
author: JGray
text:
Folks, Keith has been the artist of Mysteries of the Arcana forever. Without him, there would be no comic.

So!

Happy birthday to Keith!

Happy birthday to Keith!

Happy birthday dear Keeeeeiiiith!

Happy birthday to Keith!

And many more!

That song isn't in copyright anymore. Yay!

See you Thursday!

replies.author: David*Guest*
replies.text:
Happy birthday, Keith! hope you have a great one!

As an aside, I still can't believe that it took so long to settle the copyright on "Happy Birthday" :/

replies.author: Kietra61871
replies.text: I really love the way this page came out! You've captured the attitude I imagined for Kietra right from the start.
